summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 31, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate assignment rosters, and count slips, with one roster specifically listing Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate assigned to an attorney visit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 76318-054 on an attorney visit roster for July 31, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Carrillo
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 76049-054 on a commissary assignment roster for July 31, 2019.

persons.name: Bang
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 77863-112 on a roster for suicide observation or FS PM assignment on July 31, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine inmate counts, assignments, and out-counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including counts for commissary, suicide watch, and attorney visits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 31, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
The document shows Epstein was listed on an inmate roster for an attorney visit (ATTY assignment) on that date.
The documents are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative records (count sheets, rosters) from the day, showing standard prison operations.
